description.content:
Hey! Thank you for visiting my Website Development & Web Application Gig

 

I have spent 8 years in website development and web application development. I have completed more than 280+ Projects using various trending technologies such as Angular, VueJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, WordPress, ASP.NET MVC Framework, PHP Laravel, CodeIgniter, JAVA

 

Mobile Responsive & SEO Optimized Website is most important to increase Business Presence or It can also help you to start selling your product online.

 

Why my Service?

 

  • 100% Project completion
  • 100% Job satisfaction Or Money back Guarantee.
  • Free maintenance for 1 year support.
  • Full testing using Agile Methodology, Waterfall Methodology.
  • Deploy on servers with load balance.
  • High Quality Code, Secure architecture.
  • Fully Responsive Design for Mobile, Tablet and Desktop.
  • ZERO issues and bugs free.
  • Search Engine Friendly Markup and URL structure.
  • SEO optimized website

 

I can help you with

 

  • Full website building with admin panel
  • Customization
  • Landing page
  • Bug fixing
  • Backup migration
  • Help/consultation
  • Social media integration
  • Live chat integration
  • E-commerce with various payment integrations

 

Connect with requirements, let's get started !!!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I edit the website myself After we make it live?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes , depend on your selected package , we will give you admin panel to edit website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do i have to give you Designing or wireframe ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No , it's not necessary. we need only your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What you need to get started ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We just need your requirements to get start.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can i get post deployment support ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes you have 1-year free maintenance and support.

reviews.comment: Axel Apps is a EXCEPTIONAL company to work with. I have completed six orders with Prashant and his team. They exceed my expectations every single time. Please know that they are the best in the website/application development space!

seller_response.comment: Nice experienced with buyer. Thanks for opportunities!

reviews.comment: Very helpful and open to comments.

seller_response.comment: Nice experienced again. Thanks for opportunities!

reviews.comment:
Excellent work and communication with the team. 

They listen and take the feedback onboard.
Very responsive and puts in complete effort.
Very good to work with. I have been busy with work and he made sure to check in with me and push the project on without much guidance! Couldnâ€™t recommend enough.

notableClients.interaction_description: i was full time developer of TCS company in Gandhinagar city. i was worked on several government project in TCS like banking , post office ,  Api as well as mobile apps for peoples.

enriched_details.name: Tata Consultancy Services
enriched_details.description: Tata Consultancy Services is an Indian multinational information technology services and consulting company headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India with its largest campus located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India.
